title: hack and baned
body: So I am was trying to fiend out what to do if your account been hack and banned. I stop playing the game for some time because of work. I tray logging on to my account and found out it was ban. I read the email saying because of 3rd party program I was banned. I Logo into league friend just now saw all this weird message from other people saying I sent theme and stuff. I was going put in a ticket for this but I did not see anything under ticket that would be for this kind of problem.  I have already change my password.

replies.body:
Step one: Make a new account
Step two: This time, dont give your password to some shady website.

This is 2016, Accounts do not get hacked. Naive people just give their passwords to "free RP" scams and fake login pages.

I did not give my info out to any website. I'm not trying to be rude or anything but people do get hack a lot. There are many ways to get people passwords to your video games keystrokes ghost program's are really easy way to get this info. It a virus that will copy your keystrokes to get people credit cards or any other info they can use to sell to people. You can get this stuff onto your pc very easy. Most common way is Facebook and emails. So saying it 2016 and account don't get hacked is not true.  with the time I put into my account is way I would like it back.

Basically the same thing. TL;DR dont do dumb stuff on the internet. 

You should never get any kind of virus if you practice basic security and common sense, or, like some really dumb kids, turn off your firewall and antivirus to "speed up your computer" (it does not).

Thing is, if you sent "theme and stuff", you prob gave you account details to the ppl running the "theme and stuff", making your account into a ad bot. The people spreading phishing links **have been** phished by the phishing site.
If you truly didn't do anything of the kind like giving acc details, send a ticket. I guess you can put it under [I need help recovering my account]
